description:
go/build: update syslist.go package comment

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM
 On Jan 31, 2012 8:05 PM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg
>
>
> Description:
> go/build: update syslist.go package comment
>
> It's no longer generated by make.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5602047/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5602047/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/go/build/syslist.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/go/build/syslist.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/go/build/syslist.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/go/build/syslist.go
> @@ -1,4 +1,7 @@
> -// Generated automatically by make.
> +// Copyright 2011 The Go Authors.  All rights reserved.
> +// Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style
> +// license that can be found in the LICENSE file.
> +
>  package build
>
>  const goosList = "darwin freebsd linux netbsd openbsd plan9 windows "
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e6ce46ab79d0 ***

go/build: update syslist.go package comment

It's no longer generated by make.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5602047

On 1 February 2012 17:39, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> This CL is not correct.  See src/pkg/go/build/Makefile.

Oops. See http://codereview.appspot.com/5610046/ which addresses the
issue that prompted me to send this CL.
This CL is not correct.  See src/pkg/go/build/Makefile.

subject: code review 5602047: go/build: update syslist.go package comment
